product_name: REI CoolMax EcoMade Quarter Socks - Kids'
long_description: REI CoolMax(R) EcoMade(TM) quarter socks are made from recycled plastic bottles and deliver moisture-wicking comfort and performance. CoolMax EcoMade fabric offers the same moisture-wicking, quick-drying performance as regular CoolMax, yet is made of recycled PET. Nylon adds durability and spandex offers stretch and shape retention. Mesh-knit instep panels promote airflow and move moisture away from feet, keeping them dry and blister free. Lightly cushioned bottoms and reinforced heels and toes add shock absorption and protection from wear. Lin Toe(R) "no feel" seams preclude irritation and chafing along toes. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: REI CoolMax(R) EcoMade(TM) quarter socks are made from recycled plastic bottles and deliver moisture-wicking comfort and performance.
